meta.Title: HORSE OPERA [New York Times, Sunday, August 19, 1956]
meta.Author: Harold T. Bers

across.question: In some versions, one of the Four Horsemen.
Col. Sosthenes ___, former I. T. and T. chief.
He rode out with Dawes and Prescott.
His statue was one of Seven Wonders.
Founder of city famed for a horse.

down.question: He rode Pegasus to save Andromeda.
